channel.title: UltimaScape [Instant Oldschool Action!]
channel.description:
[CENTER][B]Are you tired of "oldschool" pking severs that have overpowered gear?
Do you want to jump right into pking action without having to level your combat stats?
Then you have come to the right place. Welcome to UltimaScape brave adventurer![/B]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/gTxTY4r.png[/img]
This servers sole purpose is to provide a fun and unique old school pking experience without the grind, and without the overpowered weapons and armors that "break" pvp. There are no chaotic weapons, no pvp armors, no curse prayers, no d claws, no spirit shields, and no summoning. The few OSRS items that have been added have been nerfed where needed.
[B][SIZE=2]Features:[/SIZE][/B] - Home is Falador, wilderness starts just north of gates. - Wilderness starts at level 5 instead of 1. - Resizable client. - Clipped player and npc pathfinding. - Set your combat stats. - You can duel players at home for others to see. - No customs. - No pvp armor. - No curse prayers. - No chaotic weapons. - No spirit shields. - No d claws. - A few OSRS items (nerfs made where need be such as toxic blowpipe) - Boss pets. - Bosses. - Minigames. - All skills are working. - Clue scrolls. - Voting, donating, and pking shops with great rewards. - Duo slayer tasks. - Clan chat. - Mystery boxes. - Random events. - Decent cosmetic shops. - Every major update from here on out is based off your feedback. (power to the players style polls)
If you guys like the server enough I will buy a good vps, and set up the domain that I already own ([url=http://www.ultimascape.com]www.ultimascape.com[/url])
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/egFPAQm.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OWuMK9x.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/CRHOOBJ.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/noexaLH.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2TpX33J.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/BL3iruD.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/VHHbyWj.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/5SoXwFH.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/zAYzNRi.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/x6YRD6x.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/85QvcGW.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/QXYxob2.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/LQDL7jJ.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/PpmIxWo.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/rN2kg6T.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/r1Hq7J1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/BbghLXv.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/DiqQrHa.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/GQ5mTkE.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HmLUWJQ.png[/img][/CENTER]
Client Download: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/0dmr8doehlx5ldl/UltimaScape_Client.jar]UltimaScape Client[/url]
More pictures besides just shops coming soon xD Post any bugs you find on this thread.

item.title: UltimaScape [Instant Oldschool Action!]
item.dc:creator: @killemquick0 killemquick0
item.description:
@killemquick0 wrote:

[CENTER][B]Are you tired of “oldschool” pking severs that have overpowered gear?

Do you want to jump right into pking action without having to level your combat stats?

Then you have come to the right place. Welcome to UltimaScape brave adventurer![/B]

This servers sole purpose is to provide a fun and unique old school pking experience without the grind,
and without the overpowered weapons and armors that “break” pvp. There are no chaotic weapons, no pvp armors,
no curse prayers, no d claws, no spirit shields, and no summoning. The few OSRS items that have been added have been nerfed where needed.

[SIZE=2]Features:[/SIZE]

  • Home is Falador, wilderness starts just north of gates.
  • Wilderness starts at level 5 instead of 1.
  • Resizable client.
  • Clipped player and npc pathfinding.
  • Set your combat stats.
  • You can duel players at home for others to see.
  • No customs.
  • No pvp armor.
  • No curse prayers.
  • No chaotic weapons.
  • No spirit shields.
  • No d claws.
  • A few OSRS items (nerfs made where need be such as toxic blowpipe)
  • Boss pets.
  • Bosses.
  • Minigames.
  • All skills are working.
  • Clue scrolls.
  • Voting, donating, and pking shops with great rewards.
  • Duo slayer tasks.
  • Clan chat.
  • Mystery boxes.
  • Random events.
  • Decent cosmetic shops.
  • Every major update from here on out is based off your feedback. (power to the players style polls)

If you guys like the server enough I will buy a good vps, and set up the domain that I already own (www.ultimascape.com)
